abstract: You can add a picture from your iPhone’s photo library to a person’s address card in the Contacts app with just a few taps.
snippet: You can add a picture from your iPhone’s photo library to a person’s address card in the Contacts app with just a few taps.
lead_paragraph: Q. How do I add a photo to someone’s address file directly in my iPhone’s Contacts app?

headline.main: Putting Faces to Names in the iPhone Contacts App
headline.print_headline: Putting a Face to an iPhone Name
